name: Dolly Parton Imagination Library
description: Free book mailed monthly to child's home for kids (up to age 5); high-quality, age-appropriate books selected by experts; builds home library of up to 60 books by kindergarten
fullDescription: Dolly Parton's Imagination Library sends a free, high-quality book every month to registered children from birth to age five, building home libraries and fostering early literacy across California.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free book mailed monthly
- For children birth to age 5
- High-quality, age-appropriate books
- Selected by early childhood experts
- Build library of up to 60 books
- Delivered directly to your home
howToGetIt:
1. Visit California State Library website
2. Enter your child's information
3. Provide mailing address
4. Register each eligible child separately
5. First book arrives within 8-10 weeks
6. Books continue monthly until age 5
